persistlayer

Class CarPersistImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • persistlayer.CarPersistImpl

  • public class CarPersistImpl
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the persistent layer class for the Car object. It explicitly communicates with the DbAccessImpl
    Author:
    Connor Kirk

      • getCarsWithParams

        public java.sql.ResultSet getCarsWithParams(java.lang.String make,
                                            java.lang.String carType,
                                            java.lang.String model)
        Finds cars with specified attributes
        Parameters:
        make - a type of car manufacturer.
        carType - the type of the car.
        model - a type of car model.
        Returns:
        ResultSet containing the cars with the filter(s) applied.

      • addCar

        public java.sql.ResultSet addCar(int ownerId,
                                 java.lang.String make,
                                 java.lang.String model,
                                 java.lang.String year,
                                 java.lang.String color,
                                 java.lang.String price,
                                 java.lang.String description,
                                 java.lang.String carType)
        This method creates a SQL query to create an entry in the car table of the database with the given information. It then returns a ResultSet containing the car id.
        Parameters:
        ownerId - Id of owner.
        make - Make of car.
        model - Model of car.
        year - Year of car.
        color - Color of car.
        price - Price per day of car.
        description - Description of car.
        carType - Body type of car.
        Returns:
        ResultSet containing id of car.

      • editCar

                    java.lang.String make,

                    java.lang.String price,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    java.lang.String carType)

        Parameters:
        id - Id of car.
        make - Make of car.
        model - Model of car.
        year - Year of car.
        color - Color of car.
        price - Price of car.
        description - Description of car.
        carType - Body type of car.

      • getOwnerId

        public java.sql.ResultSet getOwnerId(int id)
        This method creates and runs a SQL query that gets the id of the owner given the id of a car. It returns the owner id as a ResultSet.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of car.
        Returns:
        Id of owner.

      • putImage

        public java.sql.ResultSet putImage(java.io.InputStream image,
                                   int carId)
        This method creates and runs a SQL query that inserts an image into the image table. This method then returns the entry as a ResultSet.
        Parameters:
        image - Image content as InputStream.
        carId - Id of car.
        Returns:
        ResultSet containing entry of image.

      • getImages

        public java.sql.ResultSet getImages(int carId)
        This method creates and runs a SQL query that gathers images belonging to the given car. This method then returns the images in a ResultSet.
        Parameters:
        carId - Id of car.
        Returns:
        ResultSet of all images belonging to given car.

        Returns:
        ResultSet containing id of car corresponding to image.

      • deleteImage

        public void deleteImage(int id)
        This method deletes an entry from the images table with the given image id.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of image to delete.

      • getSuggestions

        public java.sql.ResultSet getSuggestions(java.lang.String col,
                                         java.lang.String searchbarContent)
        This method takes two string parameters- a column and content. This method creates and executes a query that searches the column for the given content. Then it returns the results as a ResultSet.
        Parameters:
        col - The column to get suggestions from.
        searchbarContent - The content to search the column for.
        Returns:
        A ResultSet containing the contents of the result.
